model.chip_description: Based on [8154B–AVR–07/09] Ver. 1.26. Brutte. Chip features : - Core: AVR 8-bit avr5 CPU, frequency up to 16 MHz, - Memories: 16 kiB of Flash, 1 kiB of SRAM, 512 B of EEPROM - Clock, reset and supply management: 2.7 V to 5.5 V supply, POR and 2-level BOR, 0.4-to-16 MHz crystal oscillator, Low-Swing or Full-Swing crystal option, External RC oscillator option, 32 kHz oscillator for RTC, Internal 1, 2, 4 and 8 MHz RC with calibration, - RTC: asynchronous with IRQs, clocked with independent 32kHz crystal option - Low power: Idle, ADC NRM, Power-Down, Power-Save, Standby and Extended-Standby - ADC 10-bit: up to 15ksps, up to 8 single-ended channels, up to 7 differential channels, up to 2 differential channels with 10x and 200x gain - 32 I/O ports, some with interrupt capability - Debug mode: JTAG (IEEE 1149.1 compliant) - Programming mode: JTAG, ISP, HVPP - 3 timers/counters: One 16-bit 2-channel PWM outputs with 1-channel input capture Two 8-bit 2-channel PWM outputs - Communication interfaces: One I2C interface (up to 1MHz), One USART (up to 2 Mbits/s), One SPI (up to ~8 Mbits/s)

field.name: SREG_Z
field.description: Previous operation ended with zero result

field.name: SREG_N
field.description: Previous operation ended with bit 7 set

field.name: SREG_V
field.description: Previous operation ended crossing signed range

registergroup.name: TIMER1
registergroup.description: 16-bit Timer-Counter 1 with two PWMs and input capture

field.name: FOC1B
field.description: Timer1 force output compare for channel B

field.name: FOC1A
field.description: Timer1 force output compare for channel A

field.name: COM1B
field.description: Timer1 compare output mode for channel B, bits 0-1

field.name: COM1A
field.description: Timer1 compare output mode for channel A, bits 0-1

interpretation.text: External clock on T1 pin, clock on falling edge
External clock on T1 pin, clock on rising edge

field.name: OCIE1B
field.description: Timer1 output compare B match enable

field.name: OCIE1A
field.description: Timer1 output compare A match enable

field.name: OCF1B
field.description: Timer1 output compare B pending flag

interpretation.text: Compare match B IRQ not pending

field.name: OCF1A
field.description: Timer1 output compare A pending flag

interpretation.text: Compare match A IRQ not pending

field.name: MUX
field.description: Analog Channel and Gain Selection, bits 0-5

interpretation.text: AVCC with external capacitor at AREF pin

register.name: ADCSRA
register.description: ADC Control and Status Register A

interpretation.text: Arbitration lost in SLA+W or data in Master transmitter mode
Own SLA+W received with ACK returned
Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as Master, own SLA+W received, ACK returned
General call address received, ACK returned
Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as Master, General call address received, ACK returned
Previously addressed with own SLA+W, data received, ACK returned
Previously addressed with own SLA+W, data received, NACK returned
Previously addressed with general call, data received, ACK returned
Previously addressed with general call, data received, NACK returned
A STOP or repeated START received while still addressed as slave
Own SLA+R received with ACK returned
Arbitration lost in SLA+R/W as Master, own SLA+R received, ACK returned
Data in TWDR transmitted with ACK received
Data in TWDR transmitted with NACK received
Last data byte in TWDR transmitted (TWEA=0) with ACK received

field.name: EEMWE
field.description: EEPROM Master Write Enable to EEWE

interpretation.text: Enable access to RWW or abort load if busy
Enable the SPM instruction for the next four clock cycles
